head.title: An Ordinary Day In Trenton's Life

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New Jersey

hedline.hl1: An Ordinary Day In Trenton's Life

block.p: City life is sometimes painful, sometimes gritty. And sometimes it passes in a blur. On May 3, under the auspices of the Trenton Artists' Workshop Association, 32 photographers turned their lenses on Trenton, documenting a single day. Their work has been compiled into "Trenton Takes: 24 Hours in the City," on display through Oct. 8 at the Trenton City Museum, Parkside and Stuyvesant Avenues.

City life is sometimes painful, sometimes gritty. And sometimes it passes in a blur.
